attributes.action: Say no to funding cuts in higher education
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although I am fully aware that due to excessive greedyness in the banking industry all of us wee little people are either losing our jobs or seeing our taxes poured into the pockets of big business (or both),I am now ready to draw the line. 200,000 young people not getting into university this year, meaning next year they will be paying even higher fees (if they get in then) no! Also the best universities in the country are arguing the quality of the British degree is going to suffer, so not only are we not getting in when we should, when we eventually do and leave, likely during a recession or just coming out of one, our degree will be worth less than most others in Europe. Help me to stop this!
